roleset.name: control
roleset.note: HARNESS-V NOTES: Frames file for 'harness' based on sentences in wsj. No access to Verbnet at the moment. (from harness.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: [China's year-long austerity program]-1 has achieved some successes in [*]-1 harnessing runaway economic growth and stabilizing prices but has failed to eliminate serious defects in state planning and an alarming drain on state budgets.
